title: HIRING: Customer Service Representative (Lead Intake Support)
job_overview:
Customer Service Representative (Lead Intake Support)

Job Overview:
AppAid is growing and we’re looking for Customer Service Representatives to support our intake process. These reps will play a key role in prequalifying inbound leads by asking a short set of screening questions, then transferring warm leads either to an Intake Agent or to an external partner.

Key Responsibilities:
Call on intake leads provided by the team
Ask approximately 5 basic prequalification questions per lead
Document responses accurately and professionally
Transfer or refer warm leads appropriately
Collaborate with internal intake agents to ensure smooth handoffs

Qualifications:
Strong communication skills (verbal and written)
Previous customer service or call center experience preferred
SSA (Social Security Administration) experience is a plus but not required
Detail-oriented and able to follow a structured script
Comfortable working remotely and independently

Important Note About the New Intake Support Role.

This position is designed for individuals who can thrive in a highly repetitive and monotonous environment. It involves consistent, routine tasks that require precision, focus, and stamina throughout every shift.
Key Expectations:
Graveyard Shift: You must maintain high energy and alertness during overnight hours. This is not a passive role — active engagement is expected at all times.
Call Recording & Monitoring: All calls are recorded and monitored on an ongoing basis for quality, compliance, and performance evaluation.

Performance Management:
Performance is closely tracked.
Lagging performance is addressed quickly and directly.
Micromanagement is part of the process if necessary — consistent underperformance will not be sustained.

This Role Is Not a Fit For:
Individuals with low energy, especially during late-night hours
Those who struggle with repetition or maintaining focus over long periods
Anyone uncomfortable with close monitoring or structured oversight

We're looking for driven, focused, and resilient teaUpgrade to see actual infombers who can handle the pace and expectations of this role. If that’s you, we’re excited to have you on board.

Required Equipment: (MUST HAVE YOUR OWN EQUIPMENT)
Dual monitor setup
For Windows users: Minimum Intel i5 processor, 128GB SSD, 8GB RAM, Windows 10
For Mac users: Minimum Apple M1 chip, 256GB SSD
Back up power station and Internet connection

What We Offer:
Hourly rate: Starts at $5 (may vary based on experience and your asking hourly rate)
Permanent work-from-home setup
Full-time schedule (Pacific Timezone) Long-term opportunity
Opportunities for professional growth and skill development
